testimonials.title: What Our Travelers Say
testimonials.testimonial1: YaoTu connected me with an amazing art history guide in Tokyo. The experience was transformative!
testimonials.testimonial2: My guide helped me understand Japanese business culture in ways no book could teach.
testimonials.testimonial3: Authentic, educational, and unforgettable. Exactly what I was looking for.

becomeGuide.title: Become a YaoTu Guide
becomeGuide.subtitle: Share your expertise and connect with curious travelers
becomeGuide.earnMoneyDesc: Set your own rates and get paid for sharing your knowledge
becomeGuide.flexibleScheduleDesc: Work when you want, how you want
becomeGuide.meetPeopleDesc: Connect with travelers from around the world
becomeGuide.shareKnowledgeDesc: Turn your expertise into meaningful experiences
becomeGuide.requirementsDesc: What you need to become a guide
becomeGuide.verificationDesc: Complete our verification process for safety
becomeGuide.step1Desc: Fill out your profile and expertise areas
becomeGuide.step2Desc: We'll verify your identity and credentials
becomeGuide.step3Desc: Get approved and start accepting bookings
becomeGuide.step4Desc: Begin sharing your knowledge with travelers

step1.name: Name
step1.ageRequirement: Must be at least 18 years old
step1.mbtiDescription: Help us better understand your personality traits
step1.socialProfilePlaceholder: Please enter your social media profile link
step1.residenceInfoPlaceholder: For estimating commute time (e.g.: Shinjuku, Shibuya area, etc.)
step1.residenceStartDate: Start Date of Living in Japan
step1.residenceStartDatePlaceholder: Please select the year and month you started living in Japan
step1.occupationPlaceholder: e.g.: International student, Company employee, Freelancer, etc.
step1.bioPlaceholder: What side of you do you want guests to see? Share your strengths, interests or unique experiences...
step1.uploadQualificationFilesDescription: Upload your certificates, qualification documents or other related files. Supports images and PDF format, max 10MB.
step1.clickToSelectFile: Click to select file or drag and drop here
step1.supportedFormats: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, PDF formats
step1.fileDescriptionPlaceholder: Please describe the content of this file, e.g.: Tour guide certificate, language proficiency certificate, etc.
step1.invalidFileTypeDescription: Please select a valid image (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WEBP) or PDF file.

step2.title: Self-Assessment
step2.subtitle: For matching 'Chosen Guide' tags, please evaluate yourself honestly
step2.ethicsDescription: Please briefly describe how you handle requests from guests with low ethics and guests who need help
step2.ethicsDescriptionPlaceholder: Share your views on morality, commitment, rules...
step2.boundaryDescription: Please describe how you handle the relationship between others' requests and your personal space
step2.boundaryDescriptionPlaceholder: Share how you balance serving others and protecting your boundaries...
step2.supportiveDescription: Please describe how you make people around you feel understood or comfortable
step2.supportiveDescriptionPlaceholder: Share your social skills and atmosphere adjustment abilities...

step3.title: Personalized Questions
step3.subtitle: Break away from template applications and assess compatibility
step3.q1Interaction: What kind of interactions do you hope to have with your guests?
step3.q1InteractionPlaceholder: Describe your ideal guide-guest interaction style...
step3.q2FavSpot: Please share your favorite corner of a Japanese city and explain why
step3.q2FavSpotPlaceholder: Could be an alley, cafe, viewpoint, etc. Share what makes it special...
step3.q3BoundaryResponse: How would you handle it if a guest shows disrespect during the trip?
step3.q3BoundaryResponsePlaceholder: Describe your approach and boundary principles...
step3.q4EmotionalHandling: If you're feeling down, would you be able to continue serving guests? What would you do?
step3.q4EmotionalHandlingPlaceholder: Share your emotional management and professional attitude...
step3.q5SelfSymbol: Is there one thing that you think best represents your guide abilities?
step3.q5SelfSymbolPlaceholder: Could be an experience, a habit, a belief, etc...

step4.title: Service Types & Preferences
step4.subtitle: Set your service scope, pricing and preferences

preview.previewDeclaration: I confirm that all the information provided above is true and accurate. I understand that false information may result in application rejection or account suspension.
